result.title: Safe Innovations Guidance manual for decisions per gate
result.description: Content : A report describing an analysis of the (changing) role of various actors along the innovation chain and their potential incentives for interaction and information exchange at each stage. This analysis is needed to gain insight in the feasibility that the Safe-by-design approach will be implemented by various stakeholders. A first draft willbe deliver at M12, updated at M24 and final at M35.

result.title: Establishing and running an Innovation Management Office
result.description: This deliverable will describe the activities, structure and impact of the DISIRE innovation and knowledge management office, which will be established to facilitate the innovative approach for commercialization of the DISIRE technological platform and its components. Moreover, this deliverable will report on the series of training activities implemented throughout the project duration in order to address specific challenges of research commercialization, such as time to market, design quality and functionality, manufacturability and cost efficiency in all anticipated user environments
